name: Spontaneous Automation
description:
Made for GMTK Jam 2020

These flames need to get to the birthday cakes and it's your job to make it happen.

You can't control the flames, but you can guide them with automata that specify their allowed movements. 

Tip: Watch out, if a flame can move to multiple paths, it will split itself and cover all possible paths.

--Thanks to--

Kenney for the impact sounds bundle
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/impact-sounds
